trans-unit.source: This is the second step in the <token>sb2</token> messaging features tutorial.
trans-unit.target: This is the second step in the <token>sb2</token> messaging features tutorial.

trans-unit.source: In this step, you define the management operations you will use to create shared access signature (SAS) credentials with which your application will be authorized.
trans-unit.target: In this step, you define the management operations you will use to create shared access signature (SAS) credentials with which your application will be authorized.

trans-unit.source: For clarity, this tutorial places all the queue operations in a separate method.
trans-unit.target: For clarity, this tutorial places all the queue operations in a separate method.

trans-unit.source: Create a <codeInline>Queue()</codeInline> method in the <codeInline>Program</codeInline> class, below the <codeInline>Main()</codeInline> method.
trans-unit.target: Create a <codeInline>Queue()</codeInline> method in the <codeInline>Program</codeInline> class, below the <codeInline>Main()</codeInline> method.

trans-unit.source: The next step is to create a SAS credential using a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.TokenProvider</codeEntityReference> object.
trans-unit.target: The next step is to create a SAS credential using a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.ServiceBus.TokenProvider</codeEntityReference> object.

trans-unit.source: The creation method takes the issuer name and the SAS key that was obtained in the <codeInline>CollectUserInput()</codeInline> method.
trans-unit.target: The creation method takes the issuer name and the SAS key that was obtained in the <codeInline>CollectUserInput()</codeInline> method.

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the <codeInline>Queue()</codeInline> method:
trans-unit.target: Add the following code to the <codeInline>Queue()</codeInline> method:

trans-unit.source: Create a new <token>servicensd</token> management object, with a URI containing the <token>servicensd</token> name and the management credentials obtained in the last step, as arguments.
trans-unit.target: Create a new <token>servicensd</token> management object, with a URI containing the <token>servicensd</token> name and the management credentials obtained in the last step, as arguments.

trans-unit.source: In the next step, you create the queue to which you will send messages.
trans-unit.target: In the next step, you create the queue to which you will send messages.

trans-unit.source: From the <ui>Build</ui> menu in <token>vs_current_short</token>, select <ui>Build Solution</ui> or press <ui>F6</ui> to confirm the accuracy of your work so far.
